about_the_game:
Note: This DLC requires the More Colors DLC and The Cenozoic Era base game to play.

DLC Description: Green Color Pack for The Cenozoic Era

Bring the lushness of nature to your prehistoric animal with the Green Color Pack for The Cenozoic Era! This DLC focuses on a rich variety of green shades, enhancing the look of your character.

Features:

  • Lush Greenery: Add a range of green hues to your character, from deep forest greens to the lighter, fresh greens.

  • Enhanced Environmental Detail: The added green shades bring greater depth to the character, making your prehistoric animal feel more dynamic and alive.

name: The Cenozoic Era - Green Color Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: The Green Color Pack for The Cenozoic Era adds a vibrant range of green shades to enhance your animal.
